= Scratch for Pharo: Installation Steps =

1) Download a Pharo 1.1.1 One Click package from: https://gforge.inria.fr/frs/download.php/28015/Pharo-1.1.1-OneClick.zip
** WARNING ** This process will modify some base Morphic classes and methods from the system, so please use a fresh image!

2) Dowload the following package: ScratchSkin1.4.zip (from  http://info.scratch.mit.edu/Source_Code)

3) Unzip the previous package into the same directory where the Pharo image lies (i.e. Pharo-1.1.1-OneClick/Contents/Resources)

4) Load the nscratch package from the following Monticello repository:
MCHttpRepository
   location: 'http://www.squeaksource.com/nscratch'
   user: ''
   password: ''

5) Run the following code from a Workspace:
ScratchStageMorph exemple

6) A block browser and canvas should open. Some things work, some don’t...
